mapper.insert: insert into msg (MESSAGE_NUM,MESSAGE_USER,MESSAGE_REC, MESSAGE_SUBJECT,MESSAGE_BODY, MESSAGE_FILE,MESSAGE_CHECK, MESSAGE_DATE) values (Msg1_seq.NEXTVAL,#{MESSAGE_USER},#{MESSAGE_REC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MESSAGE_SUBJECT},#{MESSAGE_BODY}, #{MESSAGE_FILE, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'미확인', sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from msg where MESSAGE_USER= #{id} or MESSAGE_REC= #{id}
select count(*) from msg where MESSAGE_USER= #{id}
select count(*) from msg where MESSAGE_REC= #{id}
select count(*) from msg where MESSAGE_USER= #{text} and MESSAGE_REC= #{id}

select * from (select rownum rnum,MESSAGE_NUM,MESSAGE_USER,MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_BODY,MESSAGE_FILE,MESSAGE_REC,MESSAGE_CHECK,MESSAGE_DATE from (select * from msg where MESSAGE_REC= #{id} or MESSAGE_USER= #{id} order by MESSAGE_NUM desc)) where rnum>= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum<= (#{page} * 10)

select * from (select rownum rnum,MESSAGE_NUM,MESSAGE_USER,MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_BODY,MESSAGE_FILE,MESSAGE_REC,MESSAGE_CHECK,MESSAGE_DATE from (select * from msg where MESSAGE_USER= #{id} order by MESSAGE_NUM desc)) where rnum>= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum<= (#{page} * 10)

select * from (select rownum rnum,MESSAGE_NUM,MESSAGE_USER,MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_BODY,MESSAGE_FILE,MESSAGE_REC,MESSAGE_CHECK,MESSAGE_DATE from (select * from msg where MESSAGE_REC= #{id} order by MESSAGE_NUM desc)) where rnum>= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum<= (#{page} * 10)

select * from (select rownum rnum,MESSAGE_NUM,MESSAGE_USER,MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_BODY,MESSAGE_FILE,MESSAGE_REC,MESSAGE_CHECK,MESSAGE_DATE from (select * from msg where MESSAGE_USER=#{text} and MESSAGE_REC= #{id} order by MESSAGE_NUM desc)) where rnum>= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum<= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.update: update msg set MESSAGE_CHECK='확인' where MESSAGE_NUM=${MESSAGE_NUM} and MESSAGE_CHECK='미확인'
